patterns: What are the benefits of AI?
responses: AI stands for Artificial Intelligence. It’s a branch of computer science focused on building smart machines.
Machine learning is a type of AI where computers learn from data and improve over time.
The future of technology is exciting! I think AI and robotics will change the world.
Neural networks are algorithms that mimic the way human brains work, used for deep learning in AI.
Deep learning is a subset of machine learning where neural networks learn from vast amounts of data.
